articles.author: Harriet Williamson
articles.title: Mick Lynch has done more for workers in two days than Starmer has in two years
articles.description: Next to Lynch, Keir Starmer looks every inch the cardboard man. Grey and insipid, more concerned about what the Tories might say than actually standing up for working people – those he’s supposed to represent
articles.content:
